content:
IEventRedirector Interface

Definition

Forwards build events to other loggers.

In this Article

public interface IEventRedirector

Remarks

See Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers for more information.

Methods

ForwardEvent(BuildEventArgs)

Called by the node loggers to forward build events to the central logger.

public void ForwardEvent (Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs buildEvent);
buildEvent
BuildEventArgs

The BuildEventArgs to forward.

Remarks

See Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers for more information.
